entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 11:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
